publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1693 John Wilson: Apprehension of Gang Membersâ€”That the Parliament notes recent media reports and congratulates Strathclyde Police force in apprehending 17 youths in a strike against gang violence; notes that the raids on the gang members were low-key and were an attempt to use the parents as a way of helping the police; is disturbed that some of the weapons seized consisted of hockey sticks, golf clubs, bicycle chains and metal bars, and considers that gang violence in Scotland is a serious problem which needs to be dealt with by the police and communities working together.
S3M-1693 Apprehension of Gang Members (lodged on 11 April 2008) Michael Matheson*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-1693 Apprehension of Gang Members (lodged on 11 April 2008) Bill Kidd*, Patrick Harvie*, Elaine Smith*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Bill Wilson*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*, Jim Hume*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-1693 Apprehension of Gang Members (lodged on 11 April 2008) Stuart McMillan*, Christina McKelvie*, Alex Neil*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Bill Butler*, Gil Paterson*
